entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 12:00 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: NE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle near noon then 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Low plus 1.
